      • evaluate

        Object evaluate(String expr)
        Evaluate is the method to use when evaluating an expression.
        Parameters:
        expr - the expression to evaluate
        Returns:
        returns the evaluation result

      • evaluate

        @Deprecated
Object evaluate(String expr,
                         Map<String,String> variables)
        Deprecated. replace variables beforehand
        Evaluates this expression by first replacing any occurrences of the supplied variable names (prefixed by $) with the corresponding values in the map. The variable names must only contain word characters.
        Parameters:
        expr - the expression to evaluate
        variables - the variables
        Returns:
        returns the evaluation result

      • evaluate

        @Deprecated
Object evaluate(String expr,
                         String... vars)
        Deprecated. replace variables beforehand
        Parameters:
        expr - the expression
        vars - the variables
        Returns:
        returns the evaluation result
